definition: to be hard on sb/to deliberately make things difficult
soldier's copper saucepan, used for cooking food by day and for sounding the night watches during the hours of darkness (in ancient times)
Diophantus of Alexandria (3rd century AD), Greek mathematician
to act wickedly/to bully/to make life difficult for sb by unreasonable actions
to put up innumerable obstacles/to create all kinds of difficulties (idiom)

sentences.english: The third is "to insure the execution of the measures and policies and optimize the circumstance for innovative talents".
sentences.chinese: 三是落实政策措施，优化创新人刁‘的成长环境。

sentences.english: Finely chop the reserved dill leaves and keep the rest for garnishing .
sentences.chinese: 将保留下来的刁草叶剁碎，以备装饰。

sentences.english: His failures did his a lot of harm.
sentences.chinese: 他缕滴失败使他的声誉受到很刁损害。

sentences.english: San Mateo County Library has many volunteer opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 圣马刁县立图书馆有许多地方欢迎义工协助。

sentences.english: The woman without pubic hair impatiently secondhand canthus Piao Diao big Peng one eye Xun scold a way.
sentences.chinese: 白虎不耐烦的用眼角瞟了刁大鹏一眼训斥道。

sentences.english: The San Mateo County Library values you as a customer and takes your personal privacy seriously.
sentences.chinese: 圣马刁县立图书馆重视您个人的隐私权。

sentences.english: The whole group got down on their knees to plead Ksitigarbha to forgive Diao.
sentences.chinese: 同来的人跪在地藏菩萨前，请他原谅刁。

sentences.english: If you live anywhere in San Mateo County, applying for a library card is simple.
sentences.chinese: 如果您住在圣马刁县内，您便可很容易的申请借书证。

definition: high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
gluttonous/see 饕餮[tao1 tie4], zoomorphic mask motif
to ramble/to rove/old variant of 熬[ao2]
surname Lou/one of the 28 lunar mansions in Chinese astronomy
a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/two-character surname Murong
to promote (to official position in former times)
